props.name: as
props.description: The element or component this component should render as. Can be overwritten by `asChild`.

props.name: activationMode
props.description: Whether a tab is activated automatically (on focus) or manually (on click).

props.name: asChild
props.description:
Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.

Read our [Composition](https://akar.vinicunca.dev/core/guides/composition) guide for more details.

props.name: defaultValue
props.description: The value of the tab that should be active when initially rendered. Use when you do not need to control the state of the tabs

props.name: dir
props.description:
The reading direction of the combobox when applicable.
If omitted, inherits globally from `AConfigProvider` or assumes LTR (left-to-right) reading mode.

props.name: modelValue
props.description: The controlled value of the tab to activate. Can be bind as `v-model`.

props.name: orientation
props.description:
The orientation the tabs are laid out.
Mainly so arrow navigation is done accordingly (left & right vs. up & down)

props.name: unmountOnHide
props.description: When `true`, the element will be unmounted on closed state.

events.name: update:modelValue
events.description: Event handler called when the value changes
